law.catch_line: The Nature Conservancy may submit to the Department a proposal outlining an area in which the Nature...
law.text: The Nature Conservancy may submit to the Department a proposal outlining an area in which the Nature Conservancy has secured or is considering securing title or other legal interest. The proposal shall include the location, acreage, explanation of planned use, and explanation of values which make the acreage of interest to the State.
